  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-UL-id</catalog>
    <entry>trubar1:colos_en/140069</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:colos_en/140069</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:colos_en/140069</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Grafična metoda za seštevanje sil</string>
            <string language="en">Graphical method for adding forces</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Graphische Methode für das Hinzufügen der 
Kräfte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Méthode graphique pour ajouter des forces</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Método gráfico para adicionar forças</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Metodo grafico per la aggiunta delle forze</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γραφική μέθοδος για τις δυνάμεις</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Método gráfico para agregar fuerzas</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Predstavitev grafične metode seštevanja dveh vektorjev s pomočjo paralelograma in primer seštevanja pri telesu obešenem na napeto žico.</string>
            <string language="en">Graphical method for adding forces with the use of parallelogram rule. Usage is demonstrated with the object causing tension on stretched rope.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">seštevanje vektorjev</string>
            <string language="en">vector sum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">paralelogramsko pravilo</string>
            <string language="en">parallelogram rule</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">colos</string>
            <string language="en">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">mehanika</string>
            <string language="en">mechanics</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Graphische Methode für das Hinzufügen der 
Kräfte mit dem Gebrauch von Parallelogramm-Richtlinie. 
Verbrauch wird mit der Nachricht demonstriert, die Spannkraft 
auf ausgedehntem Seil verursacht.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Méthode graphique pour ajouter des forces avec 
l'utilisation de la règle de parallélogramme. L'utilisation 
est démontrée avec l'objet causant la tension sur la corde étirée.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Método gráfico para adicionar forças com o uso
da régua do paralelogramo. O uso é demonstrado com o objeto 
que causa a tensão na corda esticada.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Metodo grafico per la aggiunta delle forze con 
l'uso della regola di parallelogramma. L'uso è dimostrato con 
l'oggetto che causa il tensionamento sulla corda allungata.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γραφική μέθοδος για τις δυνάμεις με τη χρήση του 
κανόνα παραλληλογράμμων. Η χρήση καταδεικνύεται με το 
αντικείμενο προκαλώντας την ένταση στο τεντωμένο σχοινί.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Método gráfico para agregar fuerzas con el uso 
de la regla del paralelogramo. El uso se demuestra con el objeto
que causa la tensión en cuerda estirada.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">geometrische Summe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Parallelogramm-Richtlinie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mechaniker</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">somme de vecteur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">règle de parallélogramme</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mécanique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">soma de vetor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">régua do paralelogramo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">mecânicos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">somma di vettore</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">regola di parallelogramma</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">meccanici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διανυσματικό ποσό</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κανόνας παραλληλογράμμων</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μηχανικοί</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">suma de vector</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">regla del paralelogramo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">mecánicos</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
